1. Open the Windows PowerShell application by clicking the Start menu and typing "PowerShell" in the search bar. Press Enter to open it.
2. In the PowerShell window, copy and paste the following command:
```
Get-Process | Where-Object { $_.Path -like "*C:\Program Files\*"} | Stop-Process -Force
```
3. Press Enter to execute the command. This will forcefully stop any unauthorized processes running on your computer.
4. Restart your computer by clicking the Start menu and selecting "Shutdown" or "Restart."

If you have any questions or concerns, please contact IT support immediately at extension 1234.
